summary.span: 表示封装一组单选按钮控件的列表控件。

span.span: Represents a list control that encapsulates a group of radio button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定列表布局Specifying List Layout](#specifying_list_layout) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件为页面开发人员提供了一个单选按钮组，可以通过数据绑定动态生成该组。The control provides page developers with a single-selection radio button group that can be dynamically generated through data binding. 它包含一个 集合，该集合包含与列表中的各个项相对应的成员。It contains an collection with members that correspond to individual items on the list. 若要确定选择了哪个项，请测试 列表的属性。To determine which item is selected, test the property of the list. ## 指定列表布局Specifying List Layout 您可以通过设置和属性来指定如何呈现列表 。You can specify how the list is rendered by setting the and properties. 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅 枚举。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 默认情况下， 设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 将此属性设置为将 `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` 导致控件水平呈现列表。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` causes the control to render the list horizontally. 某些 设置不允许水平布局。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入 。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式修改控件的显示 。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the display of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表格单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 表格单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `RepeatLayout.Table` 时才应用此属性。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 使用此属性可控制单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 它使用表中最高单元格的高度和表中最宽的单元格的宽度。It uses the height of the tallest cell in the table and the width of the widest cell in the table. 生成的单元大小统一应用于表中的所有单元格。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the table. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来填充 具有10个像素的控件单元。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the cells of a control with 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置相邻表格单元格之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 相邻表格单元格之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `RepeatLayout.Table` 时才应用此属性。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 使用此属性可控制表中各单元之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the table. 此属性将同时应用于垂直和水平。This property is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将控件的单元格的单元格空间隔开 10 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to space the cells of a control apart by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由从类派生的自定义控件中的控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法指示控件的状态是否 已更改。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 换句话说，它确定控件中的选定列表项是否与上次发送的值相同。In other words, it determines whether the selected list item in the control is the same as the last posted value. 用户更改控件中的选定项会更改控件的 值 。A user changing the selected item in the control changes the value for the control. 如果在控件中选择了同一列表项，或者如果该 控件被禁用，则 返回 `false` 。If the same list item is selected in the control, or if the control is disabled, returns `false`. 当 方法 `true` 为控件返回时，ASP.NET 页框架将调用控件的 方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

related.span: 单选按钮和 RadioButtonList Web 服务器控件

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 控件的状态已更改。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由从类派生的自定义控件中的控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 当 方法指示控件中列表项的状态已更改时，ASP.NET 页框架将在控件上调用方法 。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法调用 方法来引发 事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写 方法，以便在用户更改控件中的选定项时执行自定义处理。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user changes the selected item in the control. `RaisePostBackEvent`方法可以选择在为控件引发事件之前执行验证 。The `RaisePostBackEvent` method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要在选择控件中的列表项时验证页上的一组控件 ，请将 和 属性设置为 `true` ，然后在属性中指定要验证的控件组 。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the control is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

related.span: 单选按钮和 RadioButtonList Web 服务器控件

span.span: RadioButton and RadioButtonList Web Server Controls

span.span: Displays the control on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由从类派生的自定义控件中的控件开发人员使用 。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 控件的方法实现为 列表初始化对象，并调用 方法，该方法反过来使用 方法呈现各个单选按钮列表项。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio button list items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以使 控件始终显示为说明性文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the control is always displayed with descriptive text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRadioButtonListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/CS/custom_radiobuttonlist_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRadioButtonListRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/VB/custom_radiobuttonlist_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRadioButtonListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/CS/custom_radiobuttonlist_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRadioButtonListRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRadioButtonListRender/VB/custom_radiobuttonlist_render.vb#2)]

summary.span: 呈现 控件中的列表项。

span.span: Renders a list item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由从类派生的自定义控件中的控件开发人员使用 。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 控件的方法实现为 列表初始化对象，并调用 方法，该方法反过来使用 方法来呈现各个单选按钮列表项。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio-button list items. 控件的方法会 忽略 `itemType` 和 `repeatInfo` 参数。The method for a control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters. `repeatIndex`参数值用于选择集合中的单选按钮列表项 ，而选定的列表项将呈现到输出流中。The `repeatIndex` parameter value is used to select the radio button list item in the collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 中显示的列数。

span.span: The number of columns to display in the .

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，可以使用此属性来指定显示控件中的项的列数 。When the property is set to , you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 如果未设置此属性，则 控件将在单个列中显示列表中的所有项。If this property is not set, the control displays all items in the list in a single column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以 两个列显示控件的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of columns is set to a negative value.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection RepeatDirection { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection RepeatDirection
Public Overridable Property RepeatDirection As RepeatDirection

member this.RepeatDirection : System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置组内单选按钮的显示方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which the radio buttons within the group are displayed.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定控件的显示方向 。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由 属性确定。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果将此属性设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical` ，并且属性设置为，则将 从上到下填充第一列，然后填充第二列，直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果 设置为3，则控件的项 将显示在三列中。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in three columns. 将显示一个九项列表，如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果将此属性设置为 `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` ，并且属性设置为，则 列表中的项将以从左到右、从上到下的行显示，直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果 设置为3，则控件的项 将显示在三个项的行中。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items. 将显示一个九项列表，如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来以 从上到下、从左到右的列显示控件的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in columns filled top to bottom, and then left to right. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 列表的显示方向不是 值之一。

span.span: The display direction of the list is not one of the values.

related.span: 单选按钮和 RadioButtonList Web 服务器控件

span.span: RadioButton and RadioButtonList Web Server Controls

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，应使用 方法在控件中呈现项 。Typically, you should use the method to render items in a control. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置组内单选按钮的文本对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment for the radio buttons within the group.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定与单选按钮关联的文本是显示在左侧还是右侧。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the radio buttons appears on the left or right. 如果将此属性设置为 `TextAlign.Right` ，则该文本显示在单选按钮右侧。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the radio button. 如果将此属性设置为 `TextAlign.Left` ，则文本显示在单选按钮的左侧。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the radio button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示与控件左侧的单选按钮关联的文本 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text associated with the radio buttons on the left side of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 与单选按钮关联的标签文本对齐方式不是 值之一。

span.span: The label text alignment associated with the radio buttons is not one of the values.
